miss_msg_u: %1$s tries to stomp on you, but you dodge!
miss_msg_npc: %1$s tries stomp on <npcname>, but they dodge!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s stomps on your %2$s, but your armor protects you.
no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s stomps on <npcname>, but their armor protects them.

hit_dmg_u: %1$s swings its massive tail at your %2$s, pulverizing it!
no_dmg_msg_u: %s swings its tail at you, but it's blunted by your armor.
no_dmg_msg_npc: %s swings its tail at <npcname>, but they appear unharmed.
miss_msg_u: %s swings its tail at you, but you dodge it!
miss_msg_npc: %s swings its tail at <npcname>, who dodges it!

hit_dmg_u: %1$s swings its spiked tail at your %2$s, smashing it!
no_dmg_msg_u: %s swings its spiked tail at you, but it's blunted by your armor.
no_dmg_msg_npc: %s swings its spiked tail at <npcname>, but they appear unharmed.
miss_msg_u: %s swings its spiked tail at you, but you dodge it!
miss_msg_npc: %s swings its spiked tail at <npcname>, who dodges it!

hit_dmg_u: %1$s thrusts its long horns at you, piercing your %2$s!
no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s's horns hit your %2$s, but they glance off your armor!
no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s's horns hit <npcname>, but they glance off their armor!
miss_msg_u: %s thrusts its long horns at you, but you evade!
miss_msg_npc: %s's thrusts its long horns at <npcname>, but they dodge!

message: IF YOU CAN HEAR THIS RECORDING, PLEASE EXIT THE FACILITY.  THE TIGER IS LOOSE.
